availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaac Connoley (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, shoemaker)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, shoemaker. Maryland native. Married to Sarah A. Connoley. Father of Mary A. Connoley, Henry C. Connoley, Catharine Connoley, Frances Connoley, and Lizzie Connoley. Shoemaker in Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 2, p. 988.
Federal Mortality Census Schedules, 1850-1880, NARA T655, Roll 15, p. 705.
